oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Low nitrogen manuring increased yield in high-density organic apple production
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lindhard Pedersen, Hanne
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Soil
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Yield, fruit quality and infections of diseases are determined by many production factors in the orchard. Water and nutrition supply, the choice of rootstock, planting density and control of diseases and pest are decisive.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Lindhard Pedersen, Hanne (2005) Low nitrogen manuring increased yield in high-density organic apple production. DARCOFenews (3), pp. 1-2.
